configuration.new: missing\-class com\.fasterxml\.jackson\.databind\.ObjectMapper
configuration.justification: We allow this in com.azure.core.util.serializer.JacksonAdapter.

configuration.new: class com\.azure\.core\.http\.rest\.((PagedFlux<T extends java\.lang\.Object>)|(PagedFluxBase<T extends java\.lang\.Object.*>)).*
configuration.justification: azure.core 1.3.0 will introduce a new base type for GAed PagedFlux. Since the base type is not in azure.core <= 1.2.0, revapi is reporting it. This entry should be removed after 1.3.0 release.

configuration.new: method com.azure.core.util.IterableStream<T> com.azure.core.util.paging.ContinuablePage<C, T>::getElements() @ com.azure.core.http.rest.PagedResponse<T>
configuration.justification: Exposed through revapi transitive dependency checking. azure.core 1.3.0 will introduce a new base type for GAed PagedFlux. Since the base type is not in azure.core <= 1.2.0, revapi is reporting it. This entry should be removed after 1.3.0 release.

configuration.justification: A new overload which shares the same number of parameters was introduced, confusing revapi. azure.core 1.3.0 will introduce a new base type for GAed PagedIterable. SharedTokenCacheCredentialBuilder now inherites AadCredentialBuilderBase instead of CredentialBuilderBase thus being reported. However, AadCredentialBuilderBase also extends CredentialBuilderBase so it's not a breaking change.

configuration.new: (interface|enum|class) reactor\..*
configuration.justification: We allow reactor classes in our external APIs. This also occurs because we check transitive dependencies, so it checks reactor jars.

configuration.new: (interface|class|enum) com\.azure\.core.*
configuration.justification: azure-core classes are allowed to be exposed by dependencies using them.

configuration.new: interface org\.reactivestreams\.(Publisher|Subscriber|Subscription).*
configuration.justification: These classes exposed are publisher, subscriber, and Subscription.

configuration.new: (class|interface|enum) com\.azure\.storage\..*
configuration.justification: azure-storage-common and storage blob classes are allowed to be exposed.

configuration.new: (class|interface|enum) com\.azure\.resourcemanager\..*
configuration.justification: resourcemanager classes are allowed to be exposed.

configuration.new: (class|interface|enum) com\.azure\.security\.keyvault\..*
configuration.justification: keyvault classes are allowed to be exposed.

configuration.new: (class|interface|enum) com\.azure\.perf\.test\.core\..*
configuration.justification: perf-test classes are allowed to be exposed.

configuration.justification: Reactor added new final APIs to Flux.
